thread.section_title: Factorypure Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Factorypure | factorypure.com
thread.title: Simon

author: Simon
title: Simon
text: I found some refurbished portable fridge/coolers on their site. Although they had just sold out of what I had originally wanted they were very helpful in finding a close substitute at a really great price. They sorted out my online order quickly, followed up properly and closed the loop to make sure I was happy with what I purchased and received. I would recommend them. Thanks!
